options.name: Ticket
options.description: Tickets are the means through which your end users (customers) communicate with agents in Zendesk Support

options.name: Ticket Field
options.description: Manage system and custom ticket fields

options.name: User
options.description: Manage users

options.name: Organization
options.description: Manage organizations

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a ticket

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a ticket

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a ticket

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many tickets

options.name: Recover
options.description: Recover a suspended ticket

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a ticket

properties.name: description
properties.description: The first comment on the ticket

values.name: id
values.description: Custom field ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: externalId
options.description: An ID you can use to link Zendesk Support tickets to local records

options.name: group
options.description: The group this ticket is assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: recipient
options.description: The original recipient e-mail address of the ticket

options.name: status
options.description: The state of the ticket

options.name: subject
options.description: The value of the subject field for this ticket

options.name: tags
options.description: The array of tags applied to this ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: type
options.description: The type of this ticket

properties.name: additionalFieldsJson
properties.description: Object of values to set as described here

options.name: assigneeEmail
options.description: The e-mail address of the assignee

values.name: id
values.description: Custom field ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: externalId
options.description: An ID you can use to link Zendesk Support tickets to local records

options.name: group
options.description: The group this ticket is assigned to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: internalNote
options.description: Internal Ticket Note (Accepts HTML)

options.name: publicReply
options.description: Public ticket reply

options.name: recipient
options.description: The original recipient e-mail address of the ticket

options.name: status
options.description: The state of the ticket

options.name: subject
options.description: The value of the subject field for this ticket

options.name: tags
options.description: The array of tags applied to this ticket. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: type
options.description: The type of this ticket

properties.name: updateFieldsJson
properties.description: Object of values to update as described here

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: group
options.description: The group to search. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: query
options.description: Query syntax to search tickets

options.name: sortBy
options.description: Defaults to sorting by relevance

options.name: status
options.description: The state of the ticket

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a ticket field

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many system and custom ticket fields

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

options.name: Create
options.description: Create a user

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete a user

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a user

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many users

options.name: Get Organizations
options.description: Get a user's organizations

options.name: Get Related Data
options.description: Get data related to the user
options.action: Get data related to a user

options.name: Search
options.description: Search users

options.name: Update
options.description: Update a user

options.name: alias
options.description: An alias displayed to end users

options.name: custom_role_id
options.description: A custom role if the user is an agent on the Enterprise plan

options.name: details
options.description: Any details you want to store about the user, such as an address

options.name: email
options.description: The user's primary email address

options.name: external_id
options.description: A unique identifier from another system

options.name: locale
options.description: The user's locale. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: moderator
options.description: Whether the user has forum moderation capabilities

options.name: notes
options.description: Any notes you want to store about the user

options.name: only_private_comments
options.description: Whether the user can only create private comments

options.name: organization_id
options.description: The ID of the user's organization. If the user has more than one organization memberships, the ID of the user's default organization. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: phone
options.description: The user's primary phone number

options.name: report_csv
options.description: Whether or not the user can access the CSV report on the Search tab of the Reporting page in the Support admin interface

options.name: restricted_agent
options.description: Whether the agent has any restrictions; false for admins and unrestricted agents, true for other agents

options.name: role
options.description: The user's role

options.name: signature
options.description: The user's signature. Only agents and admins can have signatures.

options.name: suspended
options.description: Whether the agent is suspended. Tickets from suspended users are also suspended, and these users cannot sign in to the end user portal.

options.name: tags
options.description: The array of tags applied to this user. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: ticket_restriction
options.description: Specifies which tickets the user has access to

options.name: time_zone
options.description: The user's time zone

options.name: userFieldsUi
options.description: Values of custom fields in the user's profile

values.name: field
values.description: Name of the field to sort on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: verified
options.description: Whether the user's primary identity is verified or not
